description: '''John Smith Hurt''' (March 8, 1893{{refn|group=nb|There is uncertainty about his date of birth. March 8, 1893, is the date written in his family's Bible and accepted by his biographer Philip Ratcliffe and by the researchers Bob Eagle and Eric LeBlanc as the most likely. Other possible dates include March 3, 1892 (shown on his gravestone); March 8, 1892; March 16, 1892; July 2, 1892; July 3, 1893;<ref>{{cite encyclopedia|url=http://www.britannica.com/EBchecked/topic/277386/Mississippi-John-Hurt#tab=active~checked,items~checked&title=Mississippi%20John%20Hurt%20--%20Britannica%20Online%20Encyclopedia|title=Mississippi John Hurt: American Singer and Musician|encyclopedia=Britannica.com|date=October 29, 2023 }}</ref> and May 5, 1895.}} â€“ November 2, 1966), known as '''Mississippi John Hurt''', was an American [[country blues]] singer, songwriter, and guitarist.
